name: Rocketroll
description:
Created in 7.5 hours for Tantan's game jam. Multiple people were supposed to make a game with a pre-existing art pack.  Two different devlogs will be available on Tantan's YouTube channel and here: https://www.youtube.com/c/Khud0.

I'm still under the impression of GMTK 2020 (Theme: Out of Control), so Rocketroll somehow turned out to be a game about figuring out how to navigate an unstoppable rocket through the level, while the amount of turns you can take is restricted.

Movement: WSD / Arrows.
Restart Level: R.
Quit to Menu: Escape.
